Haul your sporting gear with you (kayaks, small boats, surf boards, wind surfers, bicycles, camping equipment and what ever else you like to take on or off the road). node.sales_desc: STI Tire & Wheel is thrilled to announce the release of the all-new Silverback-XLite ATV Tire. Mud enthusiasts around the country spoke, and STI listened. This new tire is based on one of the most successful STI mud tires of all times, the Gorilla Silverback, but the XLite is more accessible and useful to riders. The Silverback-XLite takes most of the features of the original Silverback and puts them in a lighter and more value-oriented package. It still delivers maximum traction in deep mud from its distinctive, aggressive, widely spaced tread pattern, but with less bulk. The lugs range from 1.125 to 1.250 inches tall depending on tire size. This allows for smoother, more versatile performance when not slinging mud in your favorite bog. It?s easier on the machine, and when comparing costs, it?s also much easier on the budget.

node.sales_desc: Key benefits of these cast deep pans will provide increased fluid capacity especially when installing a high stall torque converter. Usually high stall converters (2400 rpm and above) are built from a smaller than stock core and therefor will hold less fluid capacity. As with all high stall converters they will generate more heat than a stock converter and this condition is worsened due to the decreased fluid capacity in the system. Installing a deeper oil pan on the transmission will bring the fluid quantity back up to the stock capacity or higher.

node.long_desc: Cast from A356.0-T6 Aluminum;Adds 0.50 quarts extra fluid capacity and cooling;Built-in strengthening ribs also keeps fluid cooler;B&M logo engraved for long-lasting looks;Load bolts provide additional support to bearing caps;Magnetic drain plug for easier maintenance ;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
B&M's cast aluminum differential cover features heavy duty cooling fins, a thick 3/4-inch lip for positive sealing and built-in bearing cap bolts for extra support. The features add up to make the cover ideal for all performance applications, from daily drivers to all-out racing dedicated race vehicles. The magnetic drain plug aids in servicing your differential with out removal of the cover.

The differential covers are designed to strengthen the differential by preventing case distortion and ring gear & bearing cap deflection. Constructed of A356.0-T6 aluminum, these rugged covers significantly increase the fluid capacity and dissipate heat much faster than the stock factory unit to prolong the life of your ring and pinion gears. Additional features include an engraved B&M logo, drain and fill port locations, a magnetic drain plug for catching ferrous metal particles, and complete hardware and installation instructions.

node.sales_desc: Only a few automatic transmissions are equipped with drain plugs from the factory. To install, simply remove the pan, drain the fluid and drill a hole. Bolt the B&M Drain Plug Kit in and eliminate messy oil splash forever. Kit includes plastic seal and drain plug. Fits all Ford, Chevy, and Chrysler automatic transmissions.

node.long_desc: Universal antifreeze;Premixed ready to use;300,000 mile coolant;7-year extended life;Protects to -26F below zero;Boiling point 267F(@15PSI);California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Be Cool, America's leader in power cooling technology, has done it again with Be Coolant, an Extended-Life, Super Duty Coolant & Antifreeze that is ideal for all applications. Be Coolant features a new-generation earth-friendly biodegradable, propylene glycol formula that protects cooling systems and aluminum components down to 26 degrees below zero (F). Be Coolant provides 300,000 miles of extended-life coolant protection that is ideal for all performance and severe duty applications including American, European, and Asian high performance cars as well as diesel-powered tow vehicles and RVs. Additionally, Be Coolant features a self-sealing capability that is ideal for sealing hairline cracks in aluminum blocks and heads. Be Coolant is made in the USA, is compatible with all colors of coolant and all types of radiators, comes ready to use in recyclable gallon jugs, and is UPS-able. node.display_name: Rubicon Express Extreme Duty Axle 3-Link Axle Truss Kits
node.long_desc: Rubicon Express is proud to announce the release of the new 3-link rear suspension upgrade for Jeep JK?s. This new system delivers unmatched articulation and control for the JK platform making it perfect for the hardcore rock crawler. With improved suspension geometry, this 3-link provides better traction, while eliminating ?rear steer? and bushing bind. This system features a robust CNC laser cut axle truss, an adjustable chromoly center link, a differential support ring and high quality hardware. The system is easy to install and adjust for maximum performance. It is designed as a bolt on for Dana 44 housings. It can be ordered as an upgrade kit for vehicles equipped with a 3.5? and 4.5? Rubicon Express Extreme Duty Long Arm Suspension. Like all Rubicon Express products, this system is made in the USA and backed by the Rubicon Express Advantage Lifetime Warranty.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.sales_desc: The economy kit is the perfect setup for those looking to level out their Jeep and gain an easy 2 inches of lift at a rock bottom price. Adding just 2 inches of lift will provide more clearance for larger tires and increase the flexibility of your vehicles suspension while maintaining the fantastic ride quality. Now your vehicle is ready to hit the trails!

This is a builders kit. This kit has to be welded together and is shipped unpainted."

node.sales_desc: Replacement seating that reclines just like the original! All Rugged Ridge Seating is manufactured to exacting specifications by an original equipment seat manufacturer to guarantee only the highest quality. Each seat is constructed of durable automotive grade vinyl that is designed to match your vehicles interior and all Rugged Ridge rear seats. All frames are powdercoat painted and welded to make sure it can take those offroad adventures and years of open air use. The foam pack and spring system used on all Rugged Ridge Seats is extremely dense for long life yet soft enough for true comfort. Soft side bolsters ?cradle? the driver making driving a pleasure. Each seat features an infinitely adjustable reclining mechanism to ensure proper driving position and the ultimate in comfort. All Rugged Ridge seats feature a stylish stitch pattern and original equipment bolt pattern for ease of installation and a great original equipment look. Simply remove the old seat and bolt in the new!

node.long_desc: Black denim;Only rear glass zips out;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Rugged Ridge replacement soft tops have been developed out of years of industry research and engineering. Our trained staff of experts have developed an entire program that offers the best value, selection and design of any soft top offering. Each soft top is specifically designed to easily fit the factory original soft top hardware. Simply take off the old top and slip on the new. It is just that easy! All Rugged Ridge soft tops feature durable vinyl coated polyester and cotton fabric and crystal clear DOT approved windows that will last the test of time. All sewn seams use marine grade thread to make sure it does not deteriorate or discolor in the sun. Each seam is literally welded shut with durable heat seal tape to keep moisture out while keeping the original look of the top intact. Attaching the Rugged Ridge top is easy with the factory original belt rail attachment method; simply tuck under the rail and go!

node.sales_desc: Durable powder coat painted welded interior frame to prevent interior seat rust and to provide lasting comfort. Special patent pending seat base design that allows for easy installation in all 97-2006 CJ/Wranglers as well as 84-01 Cherokee models without any adapter brackets! Saves you money, provides extra strength and provides true ease of installation! Each XHD Seat is designed to allow full functionality on 97-06 Wranglers. The unique design incorporates the factory front slider feature along with a built-in reclining mechanism for driver comfort. The factory slide and tumble feature can be used by simply adding on the optional fold and tumble bracket kit. This kit allows for ease of entry and exit in to the back seat area. Only XHD Seating from Rugged Ridge gives you these options on late model Wranglers! Heavy-duty seat base incorporates a CAD designed girder system which provides twice the strength of any other replacement seat on the market today. This new design is the most advanced seat base ever created in the last 30 years! Dense foam pack and heavy-duty raised spring design creates a more comfortable seating experience. This new ?comfort design? has been created to ensure seat longevity and comfort all in one package. Four heat treated grade eight 7/16?side bolts attach the seat base to the seat back. This increased bolt size (most seats use 8 MM bolts) strengthens the seat back and meets DOT standards for use with late model (03-06 Wrangler) seat belt attachments. Tough automotive grade vinyl or woven fabric (XHD Off-Road Seat) and matching stitch patterns provide a great look in your Jeep and tough ?off road rated? performance. All lower seating areas have an expanded bolster area providing a wider seating area and more comfort. Wider bolsters also provide easier access/exit while entering and leaving the vehicle. A low profile seating surface along with not having to use adapter brackets provides less steering wheel interference and more comfort. The

node.long_desc: Advanced , capable, and strong;Warn Electric Winch available in 8,000, 10,000 lb. and 12,000 lbs single-line pulling capacity;Includes galvanized steel wire rope;Convertible control pack can be attached to the winch or remotely mounted, allowing for various winch mounting options and looks. (Relocation kit required and sold separately*);Updated planetary gear train and series-wound motor deliver fast, quiet, and reliable pulling power;Satin-black powder-coated finish with stainless steel fasteners and clutch lever looks great and inhibits corrosion;Improved winch sealing to keep the elements out;Large diameter winch drum reduces rope wear, is light weight, and has an integrated rope anchor for easy rope installation;Backed by the WARN Limited Lifetime Warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
The next generation of winches for trucks, Jeeps, and SUVs is here, and it's called ZEON. The WARN ZEON is a design masterpiece with innovative features and new levels of reliability and performance. ZEON isn't just a new winch. It's winching evolved.
STYLING: Totally new and unique exterior styling and symmetrical design give this winch a look that is advanced, capable and strong. The next generation in truck/SUV winches.
VERSATILITY: Convertible control pack can be attached to the winch or remotely mounted, allowing for various winch mounting options and looks. (ZEON Control Pack Relocation kit required)
QUIET: New-design planetary gear train and series-wound motor deliver fast, quiet, and reliable pulling power. Tough and capable enough to tackle anything you will.
DURABLE: Satin-black powder-coated finish with stainless steel fasteners and clutch lever looks great and inhibits corrosion. Improved IP68 winch sealing to keep the elements out.
INNOVATIVE: Large diameter winch drum reduces rope wear, is light weight, and has an integrated rope anchor for easy rope installation.
WARN ZEON: The new face of winching. ZEON showcases a new era for WARN winches, and you have never seen anything like this before.
ZEON features a symmetrical design that is modern yet rugged and looks unlike any other winch on the market. The black satin finish and stainless steel hardware resist corrosion and look great; a robust aluminum housing adds strength and durability. The innovative convertible control pack can be mounted separately from the winch or it can remain attached for an integrated look.
Backing up the new exterior design is a host of new premium internal components. The new motor and three-stage planetary gear train offer outstanding power and reliability, plus smooth, quiet operation. The motor resides in an all-new housing that also does away with exposed wires. ZEON winches f

node.sales_desc: The WeatherTech? RackSack? expands your cargo carrying capacity a whopping 13 cubic feet and measures 39 inch x 32 inch x 18?. node.long_desc: The WeatherTech DigitalFit Floor Liners are laser measured to protect the front, back and even up the sides of your vehicles footwell giving you the most advanced DigitalFit floor protection available today;Featuring high-density core materials these floorliners are the ultimate in strength and dependability;Digital laser measurements of interior surfaces offer a consistently perfect and seamless fit for your Jeep, truck or SUV;The High-Density Tri-Extruded (HDTE) material are engineered with advanced surfacing that creates channels that carry fluids and debris to a lower reservoir keeping your carpet looking fresh and clean year after year;WeatherTech DigitalFit Floor Liners are proudly designed, engineered and manufactured with American made tooling in the USA.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
WeatherTech DigitalFit Floor Liners, where Technology and All Weather Protection meet!

In the quest for the most advanced concept in floor protection, the talented designers and engineers at WeatherTech have worked tirelessly to develop the most advanced floor protection available today!

The WeatherTech DigitalFit FloorLiner accurately and completely lines the interior carpet giving absolute interior protection"! The WeatherTech DigitalFit FloorLiner lines the interior carpet up the front, back and even up the sides of the vehicle's footwell. Digital laser measurements of interior surfaces offer a consistently perfect fit!

A patent pending High-Density Tri-Extruded (HDTE) material allows for a rigid core for strength while offering surface friction to the carpet, as well as tactile feel to the surface! Advanced surfacing creates channels that carry fluids and debris to a lower reservoir with further channeling to help minimize fluid movement while driving! Once fluids become trapped in the reservoir, away from shoes and clothing, they are easily removed from the WeatherTech DigitalFit FloorLiner over the door sill. No muss-no fuss!

Rear WeatherTech DigitalFit FloorLiner incorporates many of the same design features as the front FloorLiner. Rear FloorLiners (where offered) is manufactured from a proprietary custom blended TPO (thermopolyolefin) that is not only wear resistant, but also remains flexible under extreme temperatures. Rear FloorLiner is either one piece or two piece depending on the vehicle application.

WeatherTech's DigitalFit Rear Floor Liners protects resale value too! Simply put, the cost of owning a vehicle is the difference between what you pay for it and what you sell it for. There are many factors that influence resale value; miles, exterior condition, maintenance history and of course interior condition. FloorLiner is proudly designed, engineered and manufactured with American made tooling in the USA."

node.sales_desc: Want more horsepower, better throttle response, and improved acceleration? A Rugged Ridge Air Intake System can boost your performance, while helping you keep extra cash in your wallet. Our polished aluminum mandrel bent intake tube replaces the restrictive factory air box to help improve fuel economy and performance. A black powder coated heat shield separates the filter from engine heat, dirt and debris, as cold air is drawn through a high-flow conical air filter. Unlike other reusable air filters, our dry panel design never needs oiling, which keeps your air flow sensor from being damaged by excess oil! The simple bolt on installation gives you power you can feel, adding up to 10HP and 12ft lbs or torque, depending on application.

node.display_name: Bestop TrailMax II Pro Front Seats

node.sales_desc:
Every TrailMax II seat provides the maximum in seating comfort, durability and safety. For unsurpassed appearance and durability, premium vinyl fabric maintains its shape in any temperature, is mildew resistant and is offered in factory original colors. Atlas Frame is sturdy and resists corrosion. Seats contain Variable Rate of Resistance springs for comfort on the road and support on the trail. Best quality high density closed cell foam minimizes fatigue and maintains the seat shape, ensuring comfort and best appearance for years to come. New recliner lever allows for quick and easy reclining with 20 position adjustments. Adjustable headrest that telescopes up and down, and pivots forward and back for utmost comfort. Enhanced performance bolsters and sculpted lumbar support also provide seating comfort as well as stability. Elastic mesh map pocket offers handy access storage. Seats available in complementary vinyl and full fabric fronts.

NOTE: 1997-02 Wrangler applications require seat adapter bracket part number 51256-01 for each seat. 2003-06 Wrangler applications require seat adapter bracket 51245-01 (Driver Side) and 51248-01 (Passenger side)

node.long_desc: Bestop Supertop Soft Tops for Jeep kits include adjustable frame hardware, premium fabric and removable windows;Some applications offer choice of tinted or clear windows;Designed to fit with your full factory hard doors;2-pc. full soft doors included with some CJ5 Jeep soft tops - fabric doors sold separately for CJ7 and Wrangler soft tops;Tailgate bar allows tailgate to open without opening rear window for trouble-free access;Two-year limited warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This is the top that made Bestop famous! Jeep owners wanted a complete soft top replacement kit that did more than the factory top. Bestop took its OEM fabric design and developed adjustable frame hardware that folded back behind the rear seat, and added the BeltRail attachment system. The Supertop Classic was born. It set a new standard when introduced nearly 30 years ago. And today, it's still in demand as a premium quality replacement soft top that folds back like a true convertible top.

node.long_desc: Bestop's Premium 28-oz multi-layer fabric Jeep Soft Top has excellent durability and appearance;30-mil, D.O.T. approved vinyl side and rear windows have 31% tint to help keep interior cooler in warm weather;Removable and replaceable windows feature top of the line YKK scoop count zippers for easy removal or installation with extended surface heat-sealing for strength and protection from climate extremes;This soft top for Jeeps is designed to precisely fit with your full factory hard doors;Bestop-exclusive flip-back Sunrider sunroof panel so you can open up and breathe;135 gauge polyester industrial thread use throughout with finished seams for lifelong durability;Premium hardware is black powder-coated for corrosion and scratch resistance;Features factory-style composite door surrounds, windshield header assembly, Bestop-exclusive Top Arch Bar, Quick-release Bow Knuckles and adjustable tensioning Wrangler soft top (TJ and JK);Supertop NX for 88-95 Wrangler YJ duplicates the original factory soft top configuration and its OEM features. node.sales_desc: The original Supertop Classic set the standard for replacement convertible Jeep soft tops, but Bestop wanted to make it even better. So we added our exclusive Sunrider flip-back panel, Top Arch bars and factory-style Door Surrounds to create a new generation - the Supertop NX. Ideal for those Wrangler owners that currently don't have a soft top, this is the solution to getting the most out of your Wrangler on the trail, or just around town.

Bestop Sun Bikini Top for Jeep provides coverage for the front and rear seats from direct sunlight while maintaining an open air look and feel;Classic styling like the original Bestop Jeep Bikini Tops but the Sun Bikini Top doesn't interfere with your regular soft or hard top, and doesn't require a separate windshield channel;The Sun Wrangler Bikini Top Safari Style is like an interior sun shade that you can leave on all season long;The mildew resistant premium material containsUV inhibitors to keep out all the harmful rays while still allowing sunlight into your Jeep;Heavy duty composite buckels and fittings make installation or removal of your TJ/JK Bikini top a breeze;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Bikini Tops are great, but if you want to put your soft top back on, the Bikini Top has to come off as well as the windshield channel. Sun Bikini eliminates all that because it doesn't interfere with your regular soft or hard top, and doesn't require a separate extra-cost windshield channel. It's like an interior sun shade you never have to remove, top up or top down. It offers filtered sunlight or even complete shade with the least amount of effort. Sun Bikinis strap into factory windshield header loops and center sport bar with J-Hook attachment to the upper door bars. Installation or removal is fast and easy. And the money saved in not needing a separate windshield channel can be put toward other Bestop accessories.

node.sales_desc:
For most any Wrangler owner who really understands the type of dirt, mud, candy wrappers and such that make it onto the floor of the Jeep. Custom-molded to fit exactly into place in the vehicle, these floor liners keep the mess from spoiling your carpeted floor. Just take them out, hose them down, and your ready for the next ride.

These floor mats are the massively over-engineered type with huge deep channels and high tray sides for trapping snow, mud and water. Unlike the factory floor mats, these mats are made for folks who really understand that Jeeps can get dirty.

Available for front, rear and cargo areas.

node.display_name: ARB 4x4 Accessories Intensity V2 LED Driving Lights
node.long_desc: Available in flood or spot beam;Does not require time to warm up;Engineered in Australia and manufactured in the United States
node.sales_desc:
Engineered in Australia and manufactured in the United States, the ARB Intensity V2 LED light range has been specifically designed to meet the demanding requirements of off-roaders throughout the world. From producing white light that is the closest possible imitation of sunlight, to a virtually indestructible polycarbonate lens, these lights are the premium choice.

Unlike high-intensity discharge (HID) lights, the LED range does not require time to warm up and performs brilliantly on corrugated roads by producing a broad field of light that helps diffuse vibration.

Submersible to 10ft, compliant for radio interference suppression, the ARB Intensity LED lights have been vibration tested to military specifications to ensure they can withstand extended periods of heavy corrugations and extreme conditions to keep the road ahead brightly lit.

The Intensity V2 uses the same optimal chassis design as the previous generation, incorporating the latest in LED technologyOSRAM GIANTS. The Intensity spot-light configuration uses advanced optics via the latest HyperspotTM technology. The Intensity flood-light configuration has been updated to spread the light further down the road. Pairing the spot and flood combination will give long-range visibility and shoulder-to-shoulder visibility.

node.long_desc: HID Driving Light; Incl. Grille; Single; No Harness;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Driving light improvements are often overlooked when a 4x4 is modified for increased performance, yet the role your lighting system plays in passenger safety is critical.

node.long_desc: IPF 900 HID; replacement bulb; Sold individually;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Replace your ARB Light bulbs with genuine replacement parts

node.display_name: ARB Old Man Emu Leaf Springs
node.long_desc: Heavy Duty; Military Wrap;Graphite coat;Anti Friction Pads;Anit Squeak Clamp Liners;Sold Each;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Draw Tapered & Diamond Cut Leaves: Ensure the load is progressively distributed over a larger surface area, reducing the high stresses that develop at leaf ends. This provides increased ride quality and protection against leaf breakage, significantly increasing the spring life. Fully Scragged & Load Tested: Scragging ensures the spring takes a permanent 'set' which reduces the risk of sagging. Load testing ensures the spring meets the required specification. Graphite Coating: To further reduce the friction between the spring leaves & friction pads. Military Wrap: Designed to provide added safety. Anti Friction Pads: Regreasable nylon interleaf liners reduce friction at the leaf tips where the load is the greatest. Flat Axle Seat Area: Allows a positive, safe axle mount reducing spring stress & increasing spring life. Shot Peening: The tension side of all leaves is shot peened to reduce spring stress. This process can double the life of a spring. Two-stage Leaf Pack: Featured on most rear springs for optimum comfort. When unladen the vehicle is largely riding on the primary stage, with the secondary stage providing additional support when a heavy load is added.

node.long_desc: ARB Air Locker Emblem;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Made from silver zinc alloy and featuring a cut-out ?A? symbol, the Air Locker Keyring is the perfect addition to your set of keys.

node.long_desc: Kakadu Rooftop Tent; Designed For Warmer Climates;130 lbs. Assembled Incl. Ladder And Mounting Rails;Kakadu Rooftop Tent; Designed For Warmer Climates;130 lbs. Assembled Incl. Ladder And Mounting Rails;Open - 55 inch (1400mm) wide x 94.50 inch (2400mm) long x 51 inch (1300mm) high;Closed - 55 inch (1400mm) wide x 47.25 inch (1200mm) long x 8 inch (203mm) high;Manufactured from high quality, poly/cotton rip stop canvas with polyurethane coating;High density foam mattress;sturdy aluminum retractable ladder;Insect screened windows and door;UV stabilized laminated PVC cover;Can be configured to unfold off either the Side (Shown) or off the rear of the vehicle;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The new Kakadu model tent is a new addition to the successful range of ARB Touring products. It shares many features and components with the Simpson model but has been designed for simpler set up and warmer climates where maximum ventilation is required. While it shares many of the frame components with the Simpson III, the Kakadu does not include the extendable veranda section. This makes the Kakadu ideal for fitment to the rear of utility/pick-up vehicles and trailers where the floor level can be mounted lower to the ground with no access issues to the tent. For increased ventilation, the Kakadu features larger side window openings without the canvas awning over the window exterior. This allows for greater air flow through the tent but also increased view and natural light. Internal canvas shutters are still fitted to seal the windows during inclement weather. To provide rain cover to the windows, the fly sheet has been extended and provides more protection to the entire tent. Also new to the Kakadu is a lighter high density, single layer extruded foam mattress. This reduces the overall weight of the tent and allows for easier folding of the tent during pack up.

node.long_desc: Cast from thick nodular iron;Computer-optimized cross brace to improve axle rigidity;Improved housing strength allows for optimal rin & pinion gear mesh;Increases ring & pinion load bearing;High-quality neodymium magnets for drain plug and dipstick attract and trap harmful metal particles;Prolongs carrier bearing life by improving alignment;Approach and departure angle optimzed via angled exposed cover surfaces;Dipstick/filler cap design allows for easy oil leveling;Eye-catching ARB logo cast into cover ;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
When you're off-roading, it is inevitable that obstacles and hazards will be encountered that could potentially inflict expensive damage to your differential. To prevent this, ARB offers one of the most highly-regarded and know differential cover on the market today.

Using high tensile nodular iron, it has been engineered to protect the differential and ring and pinion set from any off road hazards. Features: Computer optimized cross brace design increases the structural rigidity of the whole axle. Additional housing strength helps keep the ring & pinion gears meshing on the flat faces of the teeth, greatly increasing ring & pinion life and overall maximum load strength.

Top quality, high power neodymium magnets are used in both the Drain Plug and the dipstick to collect metallic wear particles as the vehicle moves. Magnet location in the end of the dipstick allows the oil to be checked For tell-tale signs of Internal damage.

node.sales_desc: Addictive Desert Designs has taken innovation and ingenuity to the next level and is introducing our first ever ADD MaxRax roof rack system. What makes our roof rack system unique to others in the market is that it is universal and light weight, weighing on average 15 lbs depending on the mounting hardware. The rack comes complete with our Universal Light Mount system that allows for cube lights, single row and dual row light bars to mount in multiple locations on all four sides of the roof rack. The bottom of the ADD MaxRax roof rack incorporates slats that are adjustable to your desired width to fit bags, coolers, etc. For Jeep JK there are two mounting options to choose from: Roll cage mount for when the top is off, and hard top mount for when the hard top is on; there is no soft top mount available at this time.The all-aluminum system built from 5052-0 and receives hammer black six-stage powder coat before it is shipped. node.display_name: Painless Wiring High AMP Alternator Shutdown Relay Kits
node.long_desc: 250 Amp heavy duty solenoid;Wire harness;Two 10' sections of 8 gauge wire;Crimp-on terminals;Includes all necessary mounting hardware;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This kit, complete with 250 amp solenoid, will effectively handle alternator feedback of the highest amperage alternators. Eliminates engine run-on when the master disconnect is turned off. Alternator feedback can keep your engine running even with the master disconnect turned off - this kit eliminates engine run-on. Highly recommended by most racing sanctioning bodies. Easy to install with all hardware and instructions.

node.long_desc: Helps vaporize fuel in the intake manifold when the engine is cold;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The job of the manifold heater is to help vaporize fuel in the intake manifold when the engine is cold. node.display_name: Painless Wiring CSI Universal Engine Harness

node.sales_desc: The C.S.I. harness is a universal weather-proof engine harness providing wiring to accommodate the Charging, Starting, and Ignition of just about any non fuel injected engine. The C.S.I. harness is the Painless solution to repairing damaged wiring on your carbureted engine or for cleaning up the clutter and taking the guess work away from those swapping from fuel injection to a carb. This harness also works great as a engine dyno harness. Accessory circuits aide in re-connecting a factory fuse block, electric fuel pump, electric water pump, electric cooling fans, light switch, etc. Each wire is custom printed with the circuit identification as well as using GM color codes for easy installation.

node.display_name: Jet Performance Products Jet Powr-Flo TBI Spacers
node.long_desc: The Powr-Flo spacers' bore is designed to increase the velocity of the air flow into the intake manifold. The design results in improved throttle response and impressive power gains in the mid range and top end.;California Residents: WARNING"

By delivering the air with more velocity it allows more air into the combustion chamber for a denser air charge. The design results in improved throttle response and impressive power gains in the mid range and top end.

Houses (4) 2x2 Dually Lights *Lights are NOT INCLUDED*;Provides Tie-Downs;Modular design allows mounting wherever necessary;Integrated Zip-Tie holes for wiring;Weight Capacity Rated For 60lbs;Does Not Accommodate for Panoramic Sun Roofs on Ford F-150 and Super Duty Models;12 GA (gauge) Steel Construction;Finish: 2 Stage Black Matte Powder Coat or Bare Steel;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Fab Fours universal Roof Rack is the perfect fit for your vehicle. Available in three sizes 48, 60 and 72 inches in length. Provides tie-down points and can accommodate (4) 2x2 Square LED Lights, (2) 50 light bars for the front and (2) 50" light bars for the back. Modular design allows mounting wherever necessary. Integrated zip-tie holes for wiring.

When staying active and exploring the outdoors is a priority, navigating wild terrain to meet the destination often means needing extra gear. Instead of dealing with limited space, a Fab Fours roof rack frees up the interior and provides the durability you deserve.

Quality Addition That Fits Most Budgets
While some people may be in a position to afford custom roof racks, most people have to keep their vehicle grades within a budget. This high-quality, universal fit option provides the leverage you need and is made to be last. It is available in 48-, 60- or 72-inch lengths, making it easy to find the right fit. It features tie-down points and can be fitted with square LED lights or light bars on the front and back. Since it has a modular design and integrated wiring holes, it offers mounting versatility.

Competitively Priced
Once you have decided on the perfect roof rack, you deserve to get it at an affordable price. 4 Wheel Parts offers a price-match guarantee on every part we sell. That means instead of searching around for the best deal, you can spend that time getting it installed and back on the road. This rack also comes with a limited manufacturer's warranty, instilling confidence that you can safely load up and go.

"

node.sales_desc: MaxOut dry chemical fire extinguishers have a proven track record in extinguishing the types of fires likely to occur in an automotive environment. Models MX250C, MX250R and MX250B utilize a specially fluidized and siliconized mono ammonium phosphate dry chemical. Models MX100C, MX100R and MX100B contain a siliconized sodium bicarbonate based dry chemical with free flowing and non-caking additives. All MaxOut models effectively smother and break the chain reaction of fires involving flammable liquids and pressurized gasses, and will not conduct electricity back to the operator. MaxOut models MX250C, MX250B and MX250R are also highly effective at stopping fires of common combustibles like wood and paper. Great for marine or residential use.

node.long_desc: The Rock Hard 4x4 Parts Fairlead Light Mount Bracket opening is enlarged to ensure no rubbing occurs when spooling or unspooling your cable / rope during recoveryYou will not need to unspool your winch cable/rope and remove your hook or other recovery devices to install this mount;Our single piece design means no hardware required;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Forward lighting is critical when off roading past sunset. Use our fairlead light mount to install your aftermarket lights in a safe, secure location. How is ours different? You DO NOT need to unspool your winch cable/rope and remove your hook or other recovery device (Factor55 ProLink/FlatLink etc) to install our mount! Other manufacturers' fairlead light mounts require you to unspool your entire cable and remove your hook. Skip that step and be done with your install before your wife comes out into the garage and sees you bought something new! Our single piece design means no hardware required! Our light mount sandwiches" between your winch fairlead mount and your fairlead. Using your existing hardware means no need to go hardware shopping. Our fairlead light mount opening is enlarged to ensure no rubbing occurs when spooling or unspooling your cable / rope during recovery. Compatible with both roller fairleads and hawse style aluminum fairleads."

node.sales_desc: Wade In-Channel Wind Deflectors are a quick and quality solution to reducing wind, noise, heat, and glare without compromising the entry of fresh air when windows are rolled down slightly. They are easily installed by inserting the flanged edge into the directly window channel and secured with 3M automotive grade tape. Wade Wind Deflectors promote the circulation of fresh air while minimizing its volume and strength as it re-directs it up and into, or out of the vehicle. Their sleek design deflects wind and noise from entering the vehicle for a more pleasant ride any time of year. They are made from high-gloss smoke acrylic, and have transparency, so, visibility is never obstructed.

node.sales_desc: TeraFlex is a manufacturer of premium suspension systems, body armor, low-range gearing and high-performance axles for the Jeep Wrangler. We at TeraFlex have been professionally involved with Jeeps since the 1950s, and our experience allows us the ability to make Jeeps perform their best. Since the beginning, a constant flow of new, unique and innovative products has made our line what it is today. TeraFlex was started in the fall of 1996 to meet the needs of a growing market for heavy duty off-road equipment and suspension enhancements. Since that time TeraFlex has maintained a dominant hold on the Jeep market.TeraFlex was the first aftermarket manufacturer with a suspension system for the TJ Wrangler, and is still the only aftermarket company to offer a solution for the venerable 231 transfer case's low range gearing. In 2001 the entire off-road industry was stunned at the CRD60an off-road specific high-pinion 60 differential that took innovation to a new level, reinforcing our position in the industry.Continuing our stronghold, we offer the most comprehensive list of performance components for the JK Wrangler of any other manufacturer to date. For complete performance with unsurpassed dependability, Get the TeraFlex Advantage today.

node.long_desc: GenRight Jeep spare tire carrier is made with Heavy Duty 1-3/4 inch diameter x .120 inch wall tubing;100% MIG welded tubing;Holds up to 40 inch tire;Entire assembly only weighs 55lbs;Innovative T-Handle mount can be flipped" to raise or lower the rear tire in the carrier for better on-road visibility;Relocates the rear license plate from the rear corner of the Jeep to the center of the tire carrier;Upper pins are self locking so they won't fall out;Works with factory hard or soft tops;Includes all necessary grade 8 mounting hardware;This Jeep tire carrier is Made in USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This is the hand welded version of the GenRight Swing Down" rear tire carrier for your Jeep JK (2 door or 4 door).We call it the "Boulder Series" tire carrier, as it is optimal for extreme off-road use.This innovative mounting system to securely hold almost any wheel bolt pattern and any tire size from 33 inch to 40 inch.In line with Genright's other high quality products this tube style tire carrier is made with Heavy Duty 1-3/4 inch diameter x .120 inch wall tubing. The result is a cutting edge tire carrier fits tight to the rear of the vehicle (only sticks back 15-3/4" off the tailgate) for the best possible departure angle.This is also a great rattle free way to hold a over size spare tire that will not rip apart the back of your Jeep! Combine that with easy access by one person to change up to a 40 inch tire and you have a perfect choice for a trail rig with big tires.This tire carrier will include 2 (lower pivot) mounts that can be attached to your existing rear bumper for mounting of this tire carrier on your Jeeps rear bumper."

node.display_name: Rugged Ridge HD Tire Carrier Kits
node.long_desc: The precision die-cast aluminum Hinge Casting provides maximum strength without the excess weight of steel.; Includes adjustable third brake light bracket.;Compatible with OE and most aftermarket rear bumpers.;No drilling required. ;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Spartacus HD Tire Carrier System provides the ultimate in strength and stability for mounting your oversized wheel and tire. Functionally designed to manage the amplified force and vibrations produced during extreme off-road conditions. The precision die-cast aluminum Hinge Casting provides maximum strength without the excess weight of steel. The one-piece design maintains one-handed access to cargo area and rigidly links the Wheel Mount to the reinforced section of the rear quarter panel. This, in combination with forged steel hinge brackets and hardened steel pins, results in far superior load capacity than the factory tailgate hinges, thereby effectively reducing wear and increasing longevity. The Wheel Mount lifts the mounting position and incorporates depth and tilt adjustability for large diameter and wide tire options. Tested to MIL-STD-810 to simulate extended duration of vigorous off-road driving conditions. Rated for up to and including 37 inch wheel tire combinations. Includes adjustable third brake light bracket. Compatible with OE and most aftermarket rear bumpers. No drilling required.

node.sales_desc: Trail Master suspension systems are uniquely designed to allow vehicles to take on the most extreme off-road trails, yet remain quiet and dependable for everyday driving. To do this, we design our systems to limit excessive wear and tear on factory ball-joints, steering components and reduce noise and vibrations. Making sure everything is durable and reliable is why our suspension systems include items such as, high-grade alloy steel- tube control arms, Flex-joint bushing technology, precision laser cut bolt-holes, CNC machined spindles, CNC press-brake formed brackets, and much more. Our suspension systems also come complete with everything required to properly raise your vehicle without having to order or purchase extra components. Find out why more people prefer a quality Trail Master Suspension, than other suspension kits on the market.

node.display_name: Painless Wiring GM GEN III Fuel Injection Harness
node.long_desc: OEM fitment connectors and harness breakouts;OBDII connector;EMC/PMC Service #s 12200100 Or 9354896;Controlled 4L60E Or 6 Speed Transmissions;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This harness is designed for the 1999-2006 4.8L, 5.3L, 6.0L mechanical throttle body engines using an LS1 / LS6 PCM with a 4L65E, 4L70E, 4L80E, or 4L85E transmission. 2003-2006 Engines will require a mechanical throttle body to be installed. 2003-2006 engines which were originally flex fuel will also require Delphi Multec 2 (factory truck style) injectors to be installed. Harnesses do not include connections for the rear O2 sensors or fuel tank pressure sensor but are available separate. Included with this harness is a 10 circuit weatherproof fuse block, detailed step-by-step manual, and GM color coded wires with labels for easy installation.

node.display_name: Baja Designs LP9 Series LED Lights
node.sales_desc:
A design that was inspired by Baja Designs' legendary 8 La Paz HID; The LP9 features modern styling and performance, with some of the most advanced LED technologies available today.

The LP9 utilizes 9 forward projecting LEDS to produce up to 11,025 Lumens at 105 watts, and 6 LEDs for Integrated Peripheral Technology (IPT) which produce 1,140 lumens at 10.5 watts per side. The IPT provides an incredible 200 spread of usable light.

The housing was designed to provide exceptional heat dispersion by using Direct Ducted Cooling, which allows air to travel from the front of the housing to the rear. With a day-time running light (Pro and Racer Editions only), low, and high power mode, the LP9 will fulfill all your lighting needs.

Available in a Sport model for most every-day enthusiasts, a Pro model for those that need the extra forward projecting lumens and intensity, and a Racer Edition configuration that is designed for the demands of high speed driving. The Racer Edition has similar power draw, but produces a much tighter pattern, providing higher visibility at greater distances. All models feature uService technology, which allows customers to change the lens pattern and color depending on driving conditions, or simply when they want to refresh the lens."

With over 30 years of off road racing and engineering experience, Baja Designs is the leader in high performance off road lighting technology. Our line of high performance LED lights and LED light bars offer the highest quality LEDs currently available combined with the finest optics and race proven durability. Each LED light and LED light bar has been hand-crafted and assembled in the USA. The CNC machined, billet extrusion offers a rock solid housing to securely hold each LED, lens and precision engineered optics firmly in place to ensure a long life and superior performance under extreme conditions.

node.display_name: Baja Designs OnX6+ LED Light Bars
node.sales_desc: Baja Designs OnX6 LED light bars pack an impressive 7,350 lumens per 10 section. The OnX6 LED light bars also integrate Baja Designs' trademarked High Speed Spot reflectors to give you the guaranteed furthest projecting LED Light Bar on the planet. In addition, the OnX6 LED light bar adopts industry standard sizing and is available in 10", 20" 30" 40" and 50" sizes and compatible with most aftermarket mounting systems. An industry first 30 Day Satisfaction Guarantee & Limited Lifetime Warranty is included for the ultimate in purchase protection."

node.sales_desc: Oracle's new Waterproof Headlight Halo Kit features ORACLE SMD Halos that are resin injected resulting in an IP67 waterproof rating. These rings can be installed on the outside of a vehicle and will operate in all weather conditions. This kit is C.A.D. designed to specifically install onto the outside of the turn signals of your vehicle. The halo kit is 12V powered and can be wired to a controller, switch, or directly to your turn signal harness, making it possible to operate as a full functioning turn signal.

node.sales_desc: ORACLE High-Powered LED Mirrors feature a set of LED light bars integrated into factory-style side mirrors. Designed for activities such as rock-crawling and off-road adventuring, making it easier for the driver to spot obstructions on both sides, which would otherwise go unnoticed. These provide FUNCTIONAL increased peripheral visibility for safer night-time driving. The factory part is made from ABS, our product uses high-quality Polycarbonate construction which has a higher impact rating for greater overall durability. In addition to the rugged Polycarbonate housing, there are metal rock guards" integrated into the housing to protect the LED modules from projectiles. Easy installation."

This direct-fit fog light features plug-and-play wiring for easy installation. These amazing LED units push out approximately 3000 raw lumens which is guaranteed to light up the night on road or off road! These rugged design can operate in the worst possible conditions. Perfect for the off-road adventurer who wants to cover new ground on the trail that never ends.

node.sales_desc: Mickey Thompson Metal Series MM489 features 16-spoke split fork design with deep, smooth lip, 2-stage matte black finish, and pop-top center cap. The MM489 comes in 18 to 20 inch fitment options. Features extreme split-fork design cues combined with a deep smooth lip. Corrosive resistant pop-top center cap included. 1 Year Warranty for finish and a Limited Lifetime warranty for Structural defects. Mickey Thompson Performance Tires designs, develops and distributes specialty tires for the street, strip, track, and off-road. Since its founding in 1963, the company has championed many firsts in the tire industry, from wide low-profile street tires to rugged, aggressive-tread off-road tires. Designing and producing innovative tread patterns and compounds to build the best performance tires in the world was our focus then, and is still our focus today.

node.sales_desc: Michelin Latitude Tour HP is a high performance tire for premium Crossover vehicles that offers safe, reliable Handling and a quiet, comfortable ride. The Latitude Tour HP is better handling in rain and snow than leading competitors tires. This is based on third-party snow traction and wet braking test results versus Bridgestone Dueler H/L Alenza tires, Continental 4x4 Contact tires, and Pirelli Scorpion STR tires. 2-D Active Sipes help deliver better handling in rain and snow by locking together for greater rigidity. High-Speed Confidence (Exceeding the safe legal speed limit is neither recommended nor endorsed). Experience a stable feel and crisp steering at high speeds thanks to precisely placed polyester and aramid/nylon filaments (FAZ Technology) under the tread. Aramid is the material that makes bulletproof vests bulletproof. The Latitude Tour HP is a fuel efficient tire that helps reduce harmful emissions. Save money at the pump thanks to a combination of a fuel efficient tire shape and tread compounds which reduces unnecessary friction when the tire rolls.
